name: Tumblr - Post Icons - Minimal
description: makes post icons bar smaller and removes text for a more minimalist look
css: @-moz-document url-prefix("http://www.tumblr.com"), url-prefix("https://www.tumblr.com") { .post.post_full.new_post {min-height: auto !important; padding: 0px !important;} .post.new_post .new_post_label {padding-top: 0px !important; padding-bottom: 0px !important; height: 64px !important;} .new_post_label i {top: 0px !important;} .new_post_label_text {display: none !important;} }
